    • Constructor Detail

      • CcddPaddingVariableHandler

        CcddPaddingVariableHandler(CcddMain ccddMain,
                           CcddConstants.PadOperationType padOperation,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> selectedProtoStructTables,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> referencedProtoStructTables,
                           java.awt.Component parent)
        Padding variable handler class constructor
        Parameters:
        ccddMain - main class reference
        padOperation - PadOperationType: ADD_UPDATE to add or update the variable padding; REMOVE to remove the padding variables
        selectedProtoStructTables - list of the prototype table names that will have the padding altered
        referencedProtoStructTables - list of the prototype table names that are referenced by the selected tables
        parent - GUI component on which to center the Halt dialog

      • setStructureSizes

        private void setStructureSizes(CcddPaddingVariableHandler.StructurePaddingHandler padInfo)
        Determine the total size of a structure and the largest data type within it
        Parameters:
        padInfo - list containing the padding variable information for every structure table
